text.div:
MedicationRequestPatientSearchParameter

Parameter patient:reference

Searches for MedicationRequest by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient={patientUuid}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestPatientSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient={patientUuid}
